main event: Observers watched a large, fiery object falling toward the ground that suddenly took off and disappeared from view.
interesting points: The object looked like an aircraft but was descending too fast,The observers initially thought it was going to crash, but it suddenly took off,The sighting happened in June 1966 between 8 and 10 p.m.,Witnesses described the object as being very large and saucer-shaped with a blinding red light,The object made no noise and exhibited strange behavioral patterns.
